title: 关于游戏书本内图片
author: 繁琐Fansuo
txt_content:
本帖最后由 qin905604662 于 2017-4-2 21:48 编辑 

如何在书本内加入大量的图片呢？
在玩迫降时无意发现。
可以通过更改字体的材质来实现。
通过各种生僻的汉字及符号的不同来实现。
字体材质位置：Roaming\.minecraftesourcepacks\1.8 Default Texture Pack.zip\1.8 Default Texture Pack\assets\minecraft	extures ont

以美丽新世界中的书本举个例子，例如：{Motion:[0:1.1834239707919455E-9d,1:-0.0d,2:4.853611756627014E-8d,],UUIDLeast:-7756158697837595296L,Health:5s,Invulnerable:0b,Air:300s,OnGround:1b,Dimension:0,PortalCooldown:0,Rotation:[0:223.85187f,1:0.0f,],Thrower:"fansuo233",FallDistance:0.0f,Item:{id:"minecraft:written_book",Count:1b,tag:{pages:[0:"{"bold":true,"color":"gold","extra":[{"bold":false,"color":"blue","text":"If you are reading this guide, then your ship's on-board computer has detected a critical error in your Crafting Module!"}],"text":"Hello Space Traveller!


"}",1:"{"color":"blue","text":"Worry not though, for your Crafting Module has just activated its Emergency Failsafe!

When your Crafting Module is in Emergency Failsafe mode, your crafting recipes will be limited to only those which are deemed necessary for survival on hostile"}",2:"{"color":"blue","extra":[{"color":"dark_red","text":"
(Do not place more than one item in a CM Slot!)"}],"text":"worlds.

The Emergency Failsafe ensures no internal power is wasted in the crafting process. In order to ensure this, new items can only be crafted one at a time. "}",3:"{"color":"blue","extra":[{"color":"dark_red","text":"Once again, remember not to place more than ONE item/block in any Crafting Module Slot. Also do not place items in empty slots of a recipe, as it will be lost (Craft carefully!)"}],"text":"This guide will show you the recipes which are still craftable in your dire situation.

"}",4:"{"color":"gold","text":"
===================

The Crafting Module's
  Emergency Failsafe
      Recipe Guide


===================

It's easier to use with full picture images!
